The traditional Crusteau Bread bakery is the project started by Ignasi Perez-Noguera, the result of the passion and dedication to the job and the product, and the desire to give people of Tarragona a pan of what feel proud.
 
From the culture of the autoabastiment and diy, perfecting techniques in England and discovering ancient cereals lenaris in South America, with a scientific vision and a letter Crusteau craftsman is a obrador of bread where the only ingredients are flour, water, salt and time. Organic flours, many at stone mill, refined and not salt dough (no added yeast), with a fully manual do a quality of high nutritional value, easy to digest.
 
An honest, real bread.
